pages.text: While damaging other players with needles can be fun it does not give you any direct benefit. What if the damage you inflict would be added to your own health? $(br)By combining the Voodoo Poppet with a soul lantern, ghast tears and nether mushrooms you can make it do exactly that.
The $(c)Vampiric Poppet$() is used by holding down the right mouse button. It won't steal health if the health of the target is below a certain amount or your health is full.
